thread.title: Friends call Pallavi 'Sunny Leone'
thread.title_full: Friends call Pallavi 'Sunny Leone' - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Friends call Pallavi 'Sunny Leone'
text:
Bhojpuri industry's rising actress Pallavi will soon be seen in a love story. The film has been titled - Jaan Keh De Na. Not only is she going to set the screen on fire with her sensual avtar but is also determined to make audience realise her acting potential. She has recently finished dubbing for the movie.
Raja has been paired opposite her in the film. Rakesh Mishra, Shubhi Sharma, Rohit are also a part of the film. Pallavi is also called 'Sunny Leone' by her friends.
Source: bhojpurimedia.com
